mapper.select: SELECT cardKey ,a.CardNo ,WebID ,Lang_cd ,StoreCode ,CustLanguage ,Sex ,EnName ,Phone ,Address ,city_cd ,City ,province_cd ,Province ,country_cd ,PostalCode ,EMail ,KrName ,CardIssueDate ,LastModDate FROM tblCustomer a LEFT OUTER JOIN tblCustomerHist b ON a.CardNo = b.CardNo WHERE b.NewCardNo is null AND a.Active = 1 AND a.CardNo = #{cardNo}
